price: (69) Allāh will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaḥkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
